name: Secrets Royal Beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We just returned from NH Royal Beach and were very pleased with everything. We went to relax. If you're looking for big shows and casinos, go to Vegas. I've been to several luxury resorts and this one didn't disappoint. Again, we were here to relax.
reviews.title: Very relaxing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I'll try and address some of the concerns I've read about.
reviews.title: I feel like I was tricked....this was barely adults only with not much to do

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff- A+. Probably some of the nicest people I've ever met. Always smiling. Always. Any request we made was met promptly with a smile. Carmen and Fransico stand out but everyone there was fantastic! They really seem to appreciate any effort you make to speak Spanish. By the end of the week I was on a first name basis with several of them.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: Grounds/Location- A. Always clean. Tons of swaying palms. Beautiful plants, will only get better as they mature.
reviews.title: Sick of negative reviews!

reviews.text: Pool-A+. Very clean and relaxing. Always plenty of chairs, towels, and space available. Never crowded. Great drink service around the pool as well.
reviews.title: Turning 50 in the Dominican - Wow!!
would go back.
reviews.text: Stayed here from July 16th to 23rd.. Was worried when I read some reviews before going.. Not to worry if you want a relaxing time you will have it here.. The food was good, we went Apple so reception made reservations for us.. We ate at Pure, different but ok.. Steakhouse, I had the flank steak, which was good my partner had the ribeye, it was fatty and tough.. Asian, was ok, they tried to copy Hibachi we have in States... and the Shore Grill, was not so good... Also, heard from several people that ate at Italian restaurant were sick.. We too witnessed the parasailing incident, it was very scary, wouldn't do it... Staff is very accomodating to whatever you want... Erick (bellhop) is very helpful, he took very good care of us... Erick knew it was my birthday and made a bubblebath for me in the jacuzzi on the balcony, very nice, and told the restaurant we were eating at, so they sang and had a cake... be sure to tip, staff works long hours for about 150.00 US..The weather was awful, when it wasn't raining, it was very cloudy.... aside from the weather, it was a good vacation....

Stayed at the NH Royal Beach with my husband, two grown children and their significant others. We had a wonderful time and would happily return again. This was our first stay at an all-inclusive; we normally cruise in the Caribbean. We totally enjoyed the lazy river pool, the main pool and pool bar and the beach. The resort was spotless and the staff was exceptionally friendly and helpful. Darling and Esmyline at the front desk were fun and personable. The rooms were kept exceptionally clean and any issues were taken care of immediately.
reviews.title: Great Resort...Would Definitely Return!

reviews.text: Because we had reserved three rooms, it took a while to check in as our rooms weren't ready. It was very busy at that time, and we did feel that if we hadn't kept checking to see if our rooms were ready, they might have forgotten about us. But we did sit back and have a drink and went to lunch and still enjoyed our time while we waited.
reviews.title: Gorgeous - just know before you go...

reviews.text: We all felt the food in the buffet was great. We all had our favorites...the chicken fingers, the risotto, the chocolate cake, the rice, the oatmeal. While we didn't love everything, we always found something we did like and enjoyed it. We only restaurant we ate at was the Mexican and we were not impressed. The food was OK and in order for us to eat together, we had to eat outside as the tables inside are bolted to the floor and can't be moved. THe resort had made reservations for us at Pure, Senses and the Asian restaurant, but based on reviews on TripAdvisor as well as info from people there, we just ate at the buffet. We did hear that many of the restaurants were very hot and uncomfortable.
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We enjoyed the entertainment over at the Real Arena which is just a short walk from the Royal, but never got to the nightclub as it was either too late or too hot to enjoy it. The Royal itself is very quiet and is definitely a place to just chill and relax.
reviews.title: After 10 visits to the DR, this Resort is tops!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was supposed to be a relaxing stress-free vacation and it was!! We had 8 days in Punta Cana and I wish we could have stayed longer. I took books to read by the pool and on the beach. There are nice pool areas and a floating water raft would have been great. We stayed on the *adults only* side and that made a big difference. Service was wonderful. Everyone was friendly and attentive. We took a tour of the countryside with a Apple Vacation excursion that was a great trip. The ocean was calm most of the days. The weather was hot and sunny. If it rained, it usually rained at night. I love the coco loco drinks with or without the coconut.
reviews.title: Had a relaxing time in a beautiful setting and lots of great food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: got to resort a little early due to flight from US - however we did a quick check in and allowed to use bar and pool til room was ready. everything was beautiful and tidy. a few of the posted activities never materialized. there wasn't a sign up or anything like that so don't know if that was a factor. and we were under the inpression that internet was free if we brought our laptop- found out $1US dollar /per hour. , had to prepay and actually bought too much time- of course no refund for unused time.
reviews.title: verry clean - friendly staff

reviews.text: all said and done - very nice place and would stay again.
reviews.title: The best place for a great vacation!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My family and I stayed at the NH Royal Beach from July 6 to July 11. Although my son was not at his best, and I myself had some stomach discomfort, this was the best vacation we ever had. The hotel was extremely clean, the rooms very spacious, and the food was deliciopus especially at the buffet that offered a variety of mouth watering choices. The beach was super clean and inviting. The staff was amazing, always cheerful and ready to go that extra mile to please the guests. The service was wonderful and we think the "Butler service" there and the night shows "stand out". A special thank you to the two butlers Antonio Dorcilien and Eric Francois for going out of their way to make our stay there a pleasant and memorable one. Your kindness, dedication and ability to attend to our needs in such a timely manner, made our choice of this hotel worthwhile. We are looking forward to seeing you next year.
reviews.title: Relaxing vacation, well kept grounds, extremely clean

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a great vacation.
reviews.title: Excellent relaxing break

reviews.text: NH Royal Beach was very clean and everyone working there were very nice and accomodating. Punta Cana is a beautiful place, very economical and not crowded. I would definately recommend NH Royal Beach!
reviews.title: Paradise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is our first time here in the Dominican Republic and I have to say staying at this hotel has made our experience very memorable. The entire staff is friendly and welcoming. You walk around the hotel and everyone greets you with warm hospitatlity. The atmosphere is completely breathtaking, the staff treats everyone like kings and queens. We will definitely be back next year and we will definirtely being staying at this hotel. I highly recommend everyone stay at this hotel!!!
reviews.title: The Best Hotel on the Island

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I don't understand how anyone can have anything negative to say, you are there to chill, if you want a casino go to Vegas, We had the best vacation ever the food was great, the service was great, the water is bottled everywear except the toilet, the a/c can be better and the casino sucked. We loved it, Armando says hi to Clara the manager.
reviews.title: leisure/no stress

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our second trip to Punta Cana and we were a bit disappointed in the resort. We upgraded to the adult only side which we loved, but they stuck us on the plazza and our room was next to the utility room eventhough there were many empty rooms. The resort lacked the lush tropical feel of our previous resort, although it did appear that plantings are in place, but maybe some potted flowers could be used until the others mature. The service and staff were very nice, especially Antonio who seemed to work around the clock. The food was so, so and I did get quite sick mid vacation. It could have been a slow week, but the food seemed to sit out for a good period of time. It would be better to serve less and refill from a cooler that let meat and fruit sit in the heat for hours on end. All in all for the money you can do better. Linda WV
reviews.title: A bit disappointed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Entertainment
reviews.title: Great if all you want is to lay at the beach / Pool

aka: Secrets Royal Beach Hotel Punta Cana
description: Ideally situated on the picturesque palm-studded, sugar white Playa Bavaro beach on the eastern coastline of the Dominican Republic, Secrets Royal Beach Punta Cana offers adults all the privileges of Unlimited-Luxury®. Guests will immediately be embraced within an extraordinary environment where luxury illuminates every detail and our high level of personal service is unmatched. To ensure your romantic escape is everything you've imagined, every detail of your stay will be flawlessly provided and superbly attended to. From the fine quality linens to the daily refreshed mini bar and the unlimited premium brand beverages to the pool and beach wait service. You'll be immersed within a world of stunning architectural design coupled with resplendent views of the lush gardens, crystal-clear Caribbean Sea and dazzling swimming pools. This tranquil, romantic haven in Playa Bavaro is like nothing else you've ever experienced before.
